questions.text: Which of the following is/are not a thing as per IoT?

State true or false. 
Statement: The things in IoT consist of embedded systems.

State whether the following statement is True or False. 
Statement: IoT is one of the technologies that enable smart farms.

State whether the following statement is True or False. 
Statement: In M2M, it is mandatory that the interactions between the machines and 
devices happen through a cloud computing infrastructure.

Sometimes, when there is a need for the nodes to communicate directly to the Internet, 
______________ can be used.

State whether the following statement is true or false. 
Statement: In multi-homing a node/network is connected to only two networks for improved 
reliability.
Which of the following is/are not enablers of IoT?

State whether the following statement is True or False. 
Statement: The decreasing number of devices in IoT is expected to result in an address crunch.
Why IoT has become so popular?
options: It can provide advanced level of services to the society
It can help reduce human effort
It can potentially make processes more efficient

questions.text:
State whether the following statement is true or false. 
The resolution of a sensor is the maximum change it can detect in the quantity that it is 
measuring.
Transducer is a ___________ term and includes ____________.
Which of the following is/are feature/features of sensors?
options: It is only sensitive to the measured property.
It acts on the surrounding environment.
questions.correctAnswer: It is only sensitive to the measured property.

questions.text: Which of the following technologies have unified and has resulted in the evolution of IoT?
What is the full form of IoT?
A sensor node is not made up of which of the following?
